Server.ServerController

Class ServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Server.ServerController.ServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Creates threads which enables server to be used by multiple clients simultenously
    Since:
    April 14, 2020
